text: He also told them a parable: “No one 5:36 puts a patch from a new garment ¦ tears a patch from a new garment and puts it CTputs a patch from a new garment on an old garment. Otherwise, he 5:36 not only tears ¦ will not only tear ANT CTnot only tears the new garment, but the patch from the new garment 5:36 does ¦ will CTdoes not match the old garment.
